DEVELOPER_SETTINGS.description: Settings used for internal development and debugging. Don't touch these unless you know what you're doing.

SHOW_DEVELOPER_SETTINGS.description: Enable to show developer settings in the config UI. Might want to turn this on if you're already here.

THUMB_TIP_IDX.description: MediaPipe landmark index for Thumb Tip

INDEX_FINGER_TIP_IDX.description: MediaPipe landmark index for Index Finger Tip

MIDDLE_FINGER_MCP_IDX.description: MediaPipe landmark index for Middle Finger MCP

MIDDLE_FINGER_TIP_IDX.description: MediaPipe landmark index for Middle Finger Tip

RING_FINGER_TIP_IDX.description: MediaPipe landmark index for Ring Finger Tip

PINKY_TIP_IDX.description: MediaPipe landmark index for Pinky Tip

CURSOR_TRACKING_IDX.description: Landmark index to track for cursor movement (Index Finger MCP)

TUTORIAL_COMPLETED.description: Whether the tutorial has been completed. Set to true to skip the tutorial or false to redo it.

NUMBER_OF_CONSECUTIVE_NULL_FRAMES_TO_EXI.description: Number of consecutive errored camera frames to exit the application

SHOW_DEVELOPER_LOADING_MESSAGES.description: Whether to show developer loading messages.

CURSOR_SETTINGS.description: Settings related to cursor movement and smoothing.

CURSOR_SPEED.description: Cursor speed multiplier (Higher = faster, less hand movement needed)

SMOOTHING_FACTOR.description: Cursor smoothing factor (Lower = smoother but more latency)

MOVEMENT_STABILITY_RATIO.description: Ratio of palm size for movement stability threshold

RIGHT_CLICK_DISTANCE_RATIO.description: Pinch distance ratio for Right Click (Wrist to Middle MCP)

LEFT_CLICK_DISTANCE_RATIO.description: Pinch distance ratio for Left Click

LONG_CLICK_DURATION.description: Duration (seconds) to hold click for Long Click

LONG_CLICK_RELEASE_GRACE_PERIOD.description: Grace period (seconds) after losing tracking before releasing Long Click

TOGGLE_SETTINGS.description: Settings for gestures that toggle the system or modes.

TOGGLE_ON_STILLNESS_SECONDS.description: Duration (seconds) to hold activation gesture still

TOGGLE_ON_WIGGLE_RATIO.description: Allowed movement ratio during activation hold

TOGGLE_ON_WIGGLE_MIN_PX.description: Minimum allowed pixel movement during activation hold

TOGGLE_ON_DRIFT_FRAMES.description: Max frames allowed to drift during activation

SCROLL_SETTINGS.description: Scroll gesture and scroll mode behavior.

FIST_DETECTION_LEEWAY.description: Grace period (seconds) for fist detection in scroll mode

MIC_TOGGLE_DISTANCE_RATIO.description: Pinch distance ratio for Mic Toggle

EXIT_SETTINGS.description: Gestures and triggers to exit the application.

DOUBLE_FIST_EXIT_DURATION.description: Duration (seconds) to hold double fist to exit
